Docs.summary: Button is a view that provides an item that invokes a callback when activated.

remarks.para: Provides a button that can be clicked, or pressed with the enter key and processes hotkeys (the first uppercase letter in the button becomes the hotkey).
If the button is configured as the default (IsDefault) the button will respond to the return key is no other view processes it, and turns this into a clicked event.
